title: Cambridge
creator_credit: Richard Massingham, Lewis Grant Wallace and Everyman Films
brief_description: A study of the historical University of Cambridge in its market-town setting, introducing many of the famous streets and colleges, and featuring some aspects of University life at Cambridge.
